__html:
Simd

Installation

Ensure Go with the supported version is installed properly:

$ go version
$ go env GOROOT GOPATH

Get the source code

$ git clone https://github.com/Bytom/bytom.git $GOPATH/src/github.com/bytom

Build

$ cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/bytom
$ make bytom-simd

Compile Bytom clients that support Intel SIMD technology:

  1. If you use a MacOS system, you need to install llvm run command in advance: brew install llvm.
  2. If you use the Windows system, you need to install the MinGW-w64 in advance and set the corresponding PATH environment variables.
